title: Pudong - Watch Face
summary: Pudong vibrant and futuristic watchface with battery indicator
description: Let your watchface look like a futuristic watch.Pudong [ˈPʊdong]: Pudong, the vibrant and futuristic waterfront of Shanghai gives the name of this glittering watch face.It incorporates time, date function and power reserve indicator.Compatible watches: LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola 360 (Moto 360) , all other androidware watchesNot compatible with: Motorola 360 v2
descriptionHTML:
Let your watchface look like a futuristic watch.

Pudong [ˈPʊdong]:
Pudong, the vibrant and futuristic waterfront of Shanghai gives the name of this glittering watch face.
It incorporates time, date function and power reserve indicator.

Compatible watches: LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola 360 (Moto 360) , all other androidware watches
Not compatible with: Motorola 360 v2
comments: Wow!  this one if one of your best smartwatches! I specially like the battery level monitor!
